channel.title: Selox - Step Into The 2011 ERA
channel.description:
[center][b]Selox - Step Into The 2011 ERA[/b]
[b]This project[/b] has just been started and has not much content made yet, I will try my best to update this thread daily.
[B]What will Selox be like?[/B] We are planning to make an advanced economic private server that emulates the 2011 RuneScape. We will be having large amount of content in-game. Also we are building the server for high-playerbase so economy will be good aswell. There will be probably some sort of XP-Settings with different benefits. We will be making "world-wide" -content around the world of Selox. There will be many bosses and other locations to go. We have a lot of plans for the future. Stay tuned!
[b]Details[/b] Type: Economic Revision: 637
[b]Developers[/b] Fuzen Seth Milf Hunter / K-Shan
[B]Update logs:[/B] 7.7.2013 - Finished teleportation system 7.7.2013 - Corrected Alching, ready to use and does not need more editing. 7.7.2013 - Character design (This is full and finished aswell). 7.7.2013 - Started tutorial for new users. 7.7.2013 - Finished XP Lamps 7.7.2013 - Started Bird nests and random events system.
World list [img]http://puu.sh/3wFjv.png[/img] Teleportation [img]http://puu.sh/3wFbP.jpg[/img] Enchating [img]http://puu.sh/3wFad.jpg[/img] Alching [IMG]http://puu.sh/3wEAX.jpg[/img] NPC VS NPC [IMG]http://puu.sh/3x6s9.jpg[/img] XP Lamps [img]http://puu.sh/3x6wP.jpg[/img] Corrected Combat Animations - Heres example [img]http://puu.sh/3x6L4.jpg[/img] Farming added - This is not my work. [IMG]http://puu.sh/3x6G6.jpg[/img]
[/center]

item.title: Selox - Step Into The 2011 ERA
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

Uncalled:

Looking pretty nice. I’d rather see a more filled thread though. Maybe more information on what you’re planning to do with the server and such. I’m liking the project so far, been a while since someone has done anything with 2011 stuff. Good luck, I’ll be watching this.

It’s nothing yet, hah! thanks tho. I have updated the thread, I have given more details what we plan to do with the future on Selox. Tomorrow I will be making some progress and will be updating this thread. Thank you.

EDIT: Added more media and updated thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Selox - Step Into The 2011 ERA
item.dc:creator: @MentiosRSPS MentiosRSPS
item.description:
@MentiosRSPS wrote:

[center]Selox - Step Into The 2011 ERA

This project has just been started and has not much content made yet, I will try my best to update this thread daily.

What will Selox be like?
We are planning to make an advanced economic private server that emulates the 2011 RuneScape. We will be having large amount of content in-game. Also we are building the server for high-playerbase so economy will be good aswell. There will be probably some sort of XP-Settings with different benefits. We will be making “world-wide” -content around the world of Selox. There will be many bosses and other locations to go. We have a lot of plans for the future. Stay tuned!

Type: Economic
Revision: 637

Fuzen Seth

7.7.2013 - Corrected Alching, ready to use and does not need more editing.
7.7.2013 - Character design (This is full and finished aswell).

7.7.2013 - Started Bird nests and random events system.
